title: Startup That Blends Shopping and Texting on WhatsApp Lands $50 Million
sub_head: Yalo provides tools to help companies sell their products through messaging applications like Facebook’s WhatsApp
body:
Yalo, a conversational commerce platform that helps businesses sell goods through messaging applications, has secured $50 million in new financing as it helps Facebook Inc. capitalize on its vast WhatsApp user base.
San Francisco-based Yalochat Inc., which does business as Yalo, fetched a post-money valuation of close to $1 billion in the Series C round, according to a person close to the company.
